oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks Predicts Shakeup Regarding Civil Rights"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; civil rights; Hooks, Benjamin L.; Memphis Area Chamber of Commerce; NAACP; politics; Stockton, Clifford; U.S. Navy; Zech, Lando W., Jr.; 1970s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Politicians who retreat from their support of civil rights and turn their backs on efforts to end discrimination will face an election-day uprising of blacks, civil rights leader Benjamin L. Hooks of Memphis says." (Clipping 1 of 2)
